title: PMS 2.0 522 - Thursday Night Football Recap, NFL Week 7 Preview, Dan Orlovsky, Coach Jason Brown, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat and the boys chat about last night's Thursday Night Football game, the Same Game Parlay having a rough night, the Browns getting a big win, and if it is officially time to start panicking about the Broncos. Joining the program to chat about the NFL season thus far, is 12 year NFL veteran at QB, ESPN NFL Analyst, and friend of the show, Dan Orlovsky. Pat and Dan talk about some of the horrendous takes he's had so far this year, his thoughts on Baker Mayfield, how he thinks the rookie QB's have been, what's going on in San Francisco, and more (21:23-46:26). Next, Pat and AJ Hawk go through every game in the week 7 NFL slate and make their picks (46:30-1:17:43). Later, coaching legend, host of the Slapdick Podcast, star of seasons 3&4 of Last Chance U on Netflix, Coach Jason Brown joins Pat and AJ Hawk to chat about this weekend's college football games, he gives a few of his locks, chats about what he thinks will happen at LSU and USC, Ben Simmons not wanting to play basketball, and more (1:18:52-1:48:38). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
